Posts.Content: Yep, this is me, just diagnosed today after having my static biopsy last week and a ischemic stroke just 3 short months ago with ADH of left breast. I say thank God for the lexapro to keep me so calm. I am going for my surgical biopsy next week and would just like to be kept in prayer. For some reason after turning fifty this past year I am quietly being told, I am aging...to take a breath a little deeper each day and to just enjoy my life.
Posts.Title: Atypical ductal Hyperplasia
